pl.edu.agh.jdziennik.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.agh.jdziennik.controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddClassController, AddClassSubjectController, AddGradeController, AddManyGradesController, AddParentController, AddStudentController, AddTeacherController, AdminAppWindowController, AppWindowController, AttendanceTabController, ClassTabController, GradePaneController, GradeTabController, PresentLessonController, StudentTabController, TaughtClassesTabController, TeacherTabController, UserSelectionController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all the controllers. As well as being extended by controllers, this class provides some static methods needed by them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      protected static class  Controller.AlertType
      Represents possible types of alerts, that can be shown.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        protected Controller(App app,
                     javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Creates a new controller. This constructor must be called in terms of the constructor of the child class. Objects of the child class, however, should never be instantiated directly by other code, but rather with controllerFromFXML() method.
        Parameters:
        app - Is the main application object.
        stage - Is an unused javafx stage for the window to be associated with the controller.

    • Method Detail

      • controllerFromFXML

        public static <T> T controllerFromFXML(App app,
                                       javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                                       java.lang.String FXMLPath)
        Creates a new controller by loading an fxml file. The .fxml under the given path should have it's topmost element bound to a controller class, which extends this class and provides exactly one construcor accepting the same app and stage arguments. The new controller object created through fxml shall be returned. Other elements of the .fxml file may be bound to some controller classes, all of which should also fulfill the requirements.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type parameter
        Parameters:
        app - Is the main application object.
        stage - Is an unused javafx stage for the window to be created.
        FXMLPath - Represents a path to an .fxml resource describing the window to be created.
        Returns:
        the t

      • preventColumnReordering

        protected static <T> void preventColumnReordering(javafx.scene.control.TableView<T> tableView)
        Disables drag events on table view. When drag events are disabled, the columns of table view are impossible to reorder by the user. This is an ugly, but java8-compatible way of preventing reorders
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type parameter
        Parameters:
        tableView - Represents the table, that should have it's columns unreorderable.

      • getAutonumerateCallback

        protected static <T,C> javafx.util.Callback<javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<T,C>,javafx.scene.control.TableCell<T,C>> getAutonumerateCallback()
        Provides the Callback, that can be used for table cell in setCellFactory() function to assign consecutive numbers inside rows of this table column, starting with 1, to filled rows in table view
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the objects contained within the TableView items list
        C - The type of the objects contained within the TableColumn (in this case just Object)
        Returns:
        autonumerate callback

      • showAlertDialog

        protected static void showAlertDialog(Controller.AlertType type,
                                      java.lang.String message)
        Shows to the user an alert dialog with message in it. Returns after the dialog is closed.
        Parameters:
        type - Represents type of the dialog to show.
        message - Is the text to be displayed in the dialog.

      • accessor

        protected WrappingAccessor accessor()
        Provides the WrappingAccessor used by this application instance. This method is a convenience proxy to getAccessor() method of contained App object.
        Returns:
        the

      • user

        protected WrappedTeacher user()
        Provides the current user of this application instance. Should only be used in normal mode, never in admin mode. This method is a convenience proxy to getUser() method of contained App object.
        Returns:
        the

      • getStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
        Returns the javafx stage associated with the controller/window.
        Returns:
        the stage

      • getApp

        public App getApp()
        Returns the App object representing the application instance in terms of which this controller works.
        Returns:
        the app
